name: The Best of Gremlin
overview: The Best of Gremlin compilation contains 37 Amiga games from Gremlin Software on one CD. The following games are included: Artura Butcher Hill Combo Racer Dark Fusion Deflektor Disposable Hero Federation of Free Traders Greg Norman's Ultimate Golf Harlequin H.A.T.E. Impossamole K240 Litil Divil Pegasus Plan 9 From Outer Space Premier Manager Premier Manager 2 Premier Manager 3 Premier Manager: Multi-Edit System Road Raider Shadow Fighter Skidz Spacewrecked: 14 Billion Light Years From Earth Super Cars Super Cars II Super Scramble Simulator Suspicious Cargo Switchblade Switchblade II Techno Cop Top Gear 2 Utopia Vampire's Empire Venus the Flytrap Videokid Zool Zool 2 In addition to those games, the disc also contains an Amiga emulator so that you can run those games while using Windows.
